column1: | Departing trains in excess of 100SLU/640M must be planned with a minimum 20 minute OP stop in the Up         |
| Washwood Heath Goods Loop. This is due to the train being assembled and brake test carried out in advance of |
| Departing trains towards Landor Street Jn must be planned with a minimum 40 minute run round in the Up       |
| Washwood Heath Goods Loop. This includes the time taken to assemble the train and to run round.              |
